name: Bash Bros
description:
Bash Bros is a 4 player battle-royale obstacle course game with multiple different themes offering unique experiences in each area. 

Controls (Some controls are mapped, but will be functional in upcoming version): Gamepad Controls: Computer Controls: Left Click+Mouse = Look around

WASD = Move

Space = Jump

Upcoming features include:

- Splitscreen

- Pushing Mechanic

- Grabbing Mechanic

- Insta-kill traps

- 3rd Level
